00026 #ifndef NOISEPP_BLEND_H
00027 #define NOISEPP_BLEND_H
00028 
00029 #include "NoisePipeline.h"
00030 #include "NoiseModule.h"
00031 
00032 namespace noisepp
00033 {
00034         class BlendElement1D : public PipelineElement1D
00035         {
00036                 private:
00037                         ElementID mLeft, mRight, mControl;
00038                         const PipelineElement1D *mLeftPtr;
00039                         const PipelineElement1D *mRightPtr;
00040                         const PipelineElement1D *mControlPtr;
00041 
00042                 public:
00043                         BlendElement1D (const Pipeline1D *pipe, ElementID left, ElementID right, ElementID control) : mLeft(left), mRight(right), mControl(control)
00044                         {
00045                                 mLeftPtr = pipe->getElement(mLeft);
00046                                 mRightPtr = pipe->getElement(mRight);
00047                                 mControlPtr = pipe->getElement(mControl);
00048                         }
00049                         virtual Real getValue (Real x, Cache *cache) const
00050                         {
00051                                 Real leftValue, rightValue, blendValue;
00052 
00053                                 leftValue = getElementValue (mLeftPtr, mLeft, x, cache);
00054                                 rightValue = getElementValue (mRightPtr, mRight, x, cache);
00055                                 blendValue = getElementValue (mControlPtr, mControl, x, cache);
00056 
00057                                 return Math::InterpLinear (leftValue, rightValue, (blendValue + Real(1.0)) / Real(2.0));
00058                         }
00059         };
00060 
00061         class BlendElement2D : public PipelineElement2D
00062         {
00063                 private:
00064                         ElementID mLeft, mRight, mControl;
00065                         const PipelineElement2D *mLeftPtr;
00066                         const PipelineElement2D *mRightPtr;
00067                         const PipelineElement2D *mControlPtr;
00068 
00069                 public:
00070                         BlendElement2D (const Pipeline2D *pipe, ElementID left, ElementID right, ElementID control) : mLeft(left), mRight(right), mControl(control)
00071                         {
00072                                 mLeftPtr = pipe->getElement(mLeft);
00073                                 mRightPtr = pipe->getElement(mRight);
00074                                 mControlPtr = pipe->getElement(mControl);
00075                         }
00076                         virtual Real getValue (Real x, Real y, Cache *cache) const
00077                         {
00078                                 Real leftValue, rightValue, blendValue;
00079 
00080                                 leftValue = getElementValue (mLeftPtr, mLeft, x, y, cache);
00081                                 rightValue = getElementValue (mRightPtr, mRight, x, y, cache);
00082                                 blendValue = getElementValue (mControlPtr, mControl, x, y, cache);
00083 
00084                                 return Math::InterpLinear (leftValue, rightValue, (blendValue + Real(1.0)) / Real(2.0));
00085                         }
00086         };
00087 
00088         class BlendElement3D : public PipelineElement3D
00089         {
00090                 private:
00091                         ElementID mLeft, mRight, mControl;
00092                         const PipelineElement3D *mLeftPtr;
00093                         const PipelineElement3D *mRightPtr;
00094                         const PipelineElement3D *mControlPtr;
00095 
00096                 public:
00097                         BlendElement3D (const Pipeline3D *pipe, ElementID left, ElementID right, ElementID control) : mLeft(left), mRight(right), mControl(control)
00098                         {
00099                                 mLeftPtr = pipe->getElement(mLeft);
00100                                 mRightPtr = pipe->getElement(mRight);
00101                                 mControlPtr = pipe->getElement(mControl);
00102                         }
00103                         virtual Real getValue (Real x, Real y, Real z, Cache *cache) const
00104                         {
00105                                 Real leftValue, rightValue, blendValue;
00106 
00107                                 leftValue = getElementValue (mLeftPtr, mLeft, x, y, z, cache);
00108                                 rightValue = getElementValue (mRightPtr, mRight, x, y, z, cache);
00109                                 blendValue = getElementValue (mControlPtr, mControl, x, y, z, cache);
00110 
00111                                 return Math::InterpLinear (leftValue, rightValue, (blendValue + Real(1.0)) / Real(2.0));
00112                         }
00113         };
00114 
00118         class BlendModule : public TripleSourceModule<BlendElement1D, BlendElement2D, BlendElement3D>
00119         {
00120                 public:
00122                         ModuleTypeId getType() const { return MODULE_BLEND; }
00123         };
00124 };
00125 
00126 #endif
